name: Health Flask
desc: A potion that fills you with energy and the will to fight.
effect: On your _Turn_ you may create an _Opening_ to immediately gain 10 _Health_ and _Recover_.

name: Helmet
desc: A sturdy helmet that can be difference between a glancing blow and a lethal strike.
effect: You may reduce the _Durability_ of this _Accessory_ by 1 to gain _Resistance_ against a _Crit_.
